content.en: Bladder cancer algorithms: Scientists are using algorithms to answer important questions about bladder cancer. They are using algorithms like Cell Type Identification by Estimating Relative Subsets of RNA Transcripts and LASSO Cox regression to understand the mechanisms of malignant progression and improve prognostic predictions. These algorithms analyze gene expression profiles and immune-related gene sets to classify bladder cancer into different immunotypes and identify immune-related markers for prognosis. By using bioinformatics analysis and machine learning approaches, scientists are developing gene signatures and risk score models to predict the prognosis and response to immunotherapy in bladder cancer.
content.da: Blærekræftalgoritmer: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at besvare vigtige spørgsmål om blærekræft. De bruger algoritmer som Cell Type Identification by Estimating Relative Subsets of RNA Transcripts og LASSO Cox regression for at forstå mekanismerne bag malign progression og forbedre prognostiske forudsigelser. Disse algoritmer analyserer genudtryksprofiler og immunrelaterede gen-sæt for at klassificere blærekræft i forskellige immunotyper og identificere immunrelaterede markører for prognose. Ved at bruge bioinformatik-analyser og maskinlæringstilgange udvikler forskere gensignaturer og risikoscoremodeller for at forudsige prognosen og responsen på immunterapi ved blærekræft.
